main.name: Vu Minh Diep
main.description: A sophomore at Union College majoring in ID Computer Science & Economics with interests in Software Development, Data Science/Analytics & their applications in Business Consulting

education.description: ID major in Computer Science and Economics. GPA: 3.83/4

work.title: Program Manager/Software Engineer
work.description: In charge of organizing the biggest event of SheCodes Hanoi with over 250+ female attendees. Work in a team of 17 to build auto-generated certificates, auto-graded coding assignments, and website maintenance using React, GraphQL, Material-UI.

work.title: Data Science Intern
work.description: Preprocessed and analyzed voice recordings from customer service of an electric company to build Speech Recognition. Run tests and demos the Speech Recognition system. Studied companyâ€™s financial fraud detection system.

work.title: Business Consultant Intern
work.description: Plan marketing strategies to improve SEO, update databases to find leads, manage social media accounts & websites. Communicated with the technical team and the customer to clarify the requirements and configuration.
